remarks: Deduction from transitivity of biconditional.  Useful for converting conditional definitions in a formula.  (Contributed by NM, 24-Apr-1996.)
statement:
3bitr3d.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
3bitr3d.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps <-> th ) ) $.
3bitr3d.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( ch <-> ta ) ) $.
3bitr3d $p |- ( ph -> ( th <-> ta ) ) $.
